instructions: Image titled Find a Mac Address on an iPhone Step 1 1 Open your iPhone s settings. This is the grey gear icon that is on the home screen of your iPhone. Here you can view its device settings and all customizable options. Image titled Find a Mac Address on an iPhone Step 2 2 Tap on . Scroll down the Settings screen and tap General from the list of options displayed on the menu list. Image titled Find a Mac Address on an iPhone Step 3 3 Show your iPhone s identity. Scroll down the General settings screen and select from the list of options. This will show all the unique details about your iPhone, such as its IMEI, serial number, and more. Image titled Find a Mac Address on an iPhone Step 4 4 Find the MAC address. Move down the About screen, and right below your iPhone s model or serial number, you ll find an item labeled . This is your iPhone s MAC Address. It s a twelve-digit alphanumeric combination separated by pairs using a colon (:). Advertisement
